name: OTech Aurum
description: OTech Aurum is the world's first gold particle-free conductive ink. It is a unique new product on the market which will bring you a significant cost reduction to the production of gold electrodes and coatings. It is perfect solution for medical devices, wearables and aerospace applications. OrelTech’s unique process allows the deposition of highly conductive thin metallic films. The thin layers undergo short development using cold plasma treatment resulting in a fine metal structure. OrelTech’s technology enables the deposition of the ink with many different methods and on various substrates, from plastics to fabrics. OTech inks do not contain nanoparticles, and as such enable the material economy of precious metals while being significantly more environmentally friendly than the existing alternatives on the market.
